title: Film on Prabha’s death to dispel doubts: Action Plan for LLRC implementation
content: * ‘The Army Commander appointed the board about a month ago to formulate the Action Plan. The board has almost finished the draft’ An Action Plan detailing how recommendations of the Lessons Learnt and Reconciliation Commission(LLRC) report could be implemented in the country’s North, will soon be handed over to the Ministry of Defense by…
